body.name: WOW Skin Science Coconut Milk Hair Conditioner for Dry Hair - Deep Conditioner for Dry Damaged Hair Sulfate Free Conditioner - Curly Hair Conditioner - Conditioner for Men & Women

features: Hair Repair Treatment for Damaged Hair - Our conditioner for damaged hair revives your hair back to its natural bounce, volume & shine. For best results with our mens conditioner leave in conditioner for dry damaged hair for 2-3 minutes before rinsing

Reduce Hair Loss - To help minimize your hair loss & stimulate hair growth our coconut oil conditioner contains Nettle Leaf & Saw Palmetto extracts. Our women & mens hair conditioner can help control hair from falling out while showering

Curly & Safe - Enjoy conditioner for hair boosting shine & gloss while softening your hair strands & cuticles. All hair types use our hair conditioner for damaged dry hair with waves, curly hair or as a conditioner for fine hair

Plant-Powered Ingredients - Our moisturizing conditioner is a hypoallergenic and cruelty free conditioner. Sulfate free & paraben free our essential ingredients help give a clean feel to your moisturized & hydrated hair

WOW Skin Science Promise - At WOW Skin Science we stand by our products and offer a full refund warranty if you experience any issues with your WOW Skin Science product. Contact us through the Amazon messaging system and we will be happy to assist you

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CASTOR OIL Helps lubricate the hair shaft, increasing flexibility and decreasing the chance of breakage. SEET ALMOND OIL Nourishes to promote strength and shine. ARGAN OIL Adds moisture to your hair and scalp and protects your hair from everyday damage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice stuff
reviews.reviewText: I use this in my still-wet, long, fluffy (type 2A or 2B)/wavy-but-now-thin hair (I can sit on it),. I just leave it in, let it dry, and no more frizz, no tangles, smooth as silk, VERY shiny, yet it still looks and feels sooo clean and fresh! This is a definite re-buy for me and a thumbs-up recommendation. I don't put it on my scalp, as I'm not sure how good that would look after drying.I use just a little of this in my palm with water to spread it out thinly, then pat it onto the length of my wet hair. If I had 4B or 4C hair, I would probably coat each strand of clean hair WITHOUT using extra water.This stuff is YUMMY and smells wonderful even after drying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for men or women
reviews.reviewText: First tried this conditioner when my wife received the shampoo(the shampoo was an apple scent which I didn't like) and conditioner(the conditioner was coconut which I do like) as a gift from our sister in law. Wasn't sure at first but after using for a few weeks noticed my hair was easier to brush through and the hair was softer. We have since added the coconut shampoo and with both we have both noticed that our hair is softer and has a better feel. I know this isn't what a guy would normally be writing about but since my hair and beard(it too feels better) are longer than normal with being unable to get to a barber shop/salon (thanks CA) it's just the way it is. Also contacted the vendor and to quote their name WOW, their customer service is fantastic and their response time is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have been dying my hair for the last 30 years. It was dull, lifeless, dry, and literally no shine whatsoever. My scalp was dry and itchy all the time. Blow drying and using a other heating styling tools certainly didn't help.I have tried almost every shampoo, conditioner, oils, hair masks known to man...Nothing worked or helped. No matter what shampoo or conditioner I used my hair always had an odd odor to it.I decided to try WOW. I opted to try the conditioner, and the hair oil.After the first use my hair felt soft, It had body, volume and was manageable and after many years of not having a shine, I finally saw a shine to my hair.I noticed upon rinsing that my hair felt totally clean and didn't have that conditioner "coating" I normally get with other conditioners. I thought " this isn't going to work". Well after styling I was amazed. My hair hasn't looked this good in years!I would definitely recommend this conditioner. I am going to purchase the shampoo as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars just a tiny bit works wonders!
reviews.reviewText: Love this stuff & a bottle lasts me forever as my hair is short but it really only takes a tiny bit and Smells So good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked great for months, then took a wrong turn
reviews.reviewText: I first received both the ACV shampoo and conditioner back in May with my first ever order, I was amazed at first with the results and my hair seemed to grow at a faster pace then normal over the next few months prior. About 2 months into using it, I noticed my hair became very dry at the ends even with leaving in the conditioner. I liked that the products made my hair grow quicker, but in return it was slowly damaging my ends...my advice to you is this: enjoy it while you can, but as soon as it stops working STOP using it! I was disappointed that my hair started to break at the ends, but it didn’t surprise me because my hair has a tendency to get used to products very quickly. Overall, not a bad product but beware of overusage and dried hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I lost my hair because of chemo. I needed a shampoo to help my hair as it came back. I have always had fine hair but this shampoo makes it look so much thicker and I think it has helped with my hair loss.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have used for several years now
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I both have used the wow shampoo and conditioner for several years now and like it. If you shampoo too often without using the conditioner it will dry your hair, at least speaking for myself, but using the conditioner with it takes care of any dryness. Will keep buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This conditioner did exactly what it WASN'T supposed to do.
reviews.reviewText: First of all, this conditioner smells wonderful. However, everything it claimed to do to your hair was the exact opposite for me! Restore dry hair? My hair was so dry, it felt like straw. Good for frizzy hair? My hair got frizzier and more out of control. Shiny hair? My hair was dull and heavy. Tangles? If you want your hair to be so hopelessly tangled, sure, get this conditioner. My family and I tried this conditioner, along with it's partner shampoo, on three separate occasions. We all had the same complaints. Back it went. I was afraid I had to get a foot of my hair chopped off! Luckily, my hairdresser saved most of my tresses. I DON'T recommend this for dry or curly hair!
